descriptionHtml:
Instructions to use Jasmin ENB + COT v1.61 realistic graphic



ENB v0.178


1. First, go to http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0178.htm (ENB Site)


2. Please, Download ENB v0.178


3. Overwrite ENB v0.178 files with Jastmin ENB Or you just have to send d3d9.dll file to Jasmin folder.




=======================================================================================





Instructions to use Jasmin ENB + COT v1.5 realistic graphic


1. First, go to http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0157.htm (ENB Site)


2. Please, Download ENB v0.157 


3. Overwrite ENB v0.157 files with Jastmin ENB Or you just have to send d3d9.dll file to Jasmin folder.



4. Open SkyrimPrefs.ini located in My Document\\My Games\\Skyrim


5. Find the line, bFloatPointRenderTarget=0 from [Display] tap, and replace the number 0 with 1
   Save and exit 

If that command line doesn\'t exist, input manually. This is a must to activate all the functions to use enb.


6. Make sure you don\'t use other graphic mods. If you have some installed already, delete those. 


7. Please, Download Climates Of Tamriel v3.1

   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802//?



  00 Main Files > ClimatesOfTamriel or ClimatesOfTamriel.bsa


? SkyrimLauncher -> Data Files -> check (active)




Thank you for endorse












credit

The develpoer of ENB, Boris Vorontsov : http://enbdev.com/

SRF ENB : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30285/?




remodel SRF enb

config or enbpalette <edit> jasmin




Jasmin : http://blog.naver.com/r6angel
author: r6angel
